column4: Help, how do I get gnash to work w/ firefox to watch youtube vids?
You can watch youtube videos in Totem Movie Player
do i have to download them first?
There is a youtube plugin that comes with Totem ( Applications > Sound and Video > Movie player ) that lets you browse and watch youtube videos
okay, where can I find instructions to set that up?
Do you see the drop down menu at the top right in totem that says "Playlist" ?
i guess i don't have totem installed, just reinstalled karmic today
It comes by default unless you are using kubuntu
It's just called "Movie Player" in the menu though
All I show is movie player under Sound & Video
EastDallas: got movie player open i see PlayList
Click that drop down menu and chose "youtube"
Is that all there is to it?
Unreal been struggling w/ this for about 5 hrs. Thanx ever so much.
